testsuite.name: MainTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #4
There is should be 10 lines in the output when you check 10 files! Make sure you don't print empty lines.
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test.
---
Arguments: test_files %txt- "TXT document"
doc5.pdf: TXT document doc7.pdf: TXT document
